Class VendingMachineController

  • java.lang.Object
    • VendingMachineController

  • public class VendingMachineController
extends java.lang.Object
    VendingMachineController.java - Connects the user interface and input from the user to the Stock and MoneyHandler classes, allowing actions to take place based on user input. Holds current coins placed in machine until a purchase is made or coins are refunded.
    Version:
    10/1/15
    Author:
    Justin Watts

      private int totalQuarters

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String add(double coin)
      Monitors the amount of money inserted into Vending Machine both in total and in amount of each individual coin.
      void collect()
      Removes all coins inserted into machine except for baseline amount
      java.lang.String[] getItemList()
      Obtains product names in order to populate Vending Machine display.
      java.lang.String makePurchase(java.lang.String selection)
      Handles purchase by user through checking if product is sold out and proceeding to send instructions to both Stock and MoneyHandler classes to remove the product and store the coins inserted for payment respectively.
      java.lang.String refund()
      Returns all money inserted into Vending Machine.
      void restock()
      Returns all products to full stock

    • Method Detail

      • getItemList

        public java.lang.String[] getItemList()
        Obtains product names in order to populate Vending Machine display.
        Returns:
        names of all nine products in an array of Strings

      • add

        public java.lang.String add(double coin)
        Monitors the amount of money inserted into Vending Machine both in total and in amount of each individual coin.
        Parameters:
        coin - monetary amount of coin inserted as a double
        Returns:
        message detailing amount of money entered

      • refund

        public java.lang.String refund()
        Returns all money inserted into Vending Machine.
        Returns:
        message to user that all money has been refunded

      • makePurchase

        public java.lang.String makePurchase(java.lang.String selection)
        Handles purchase by user through checking if product is sold out and proceeding to send instructions to both Stock and MoneyHandler classes to remove the product and store the coins inserted for payment respectively. Also handles making change and checking to make sure enough money was inserted.
        Parameters:
        selection - which product the user is attempting to purchase
        Returns:
        message that product is sold out, user transaction was successful, or not enough money was inserted

      • restock

        public void restock()
        Returns all products to full stock

      • collect

        public void collect()
        Removes all coins inserted into machine except for baseline amount
